channel.title: Original Xbox Live dies today
channel.description:
Just thought I should make a thread to reminisce on the good old days. Remember to download all the DLC for your Xbox Original games, cause they are leaving too, and you don't want to go without them. So boot up your Splinter Cells, your Battlefronts, your Crimson Skies, your KOTORs, your Halo 2s, anything that you'll want to say goodbye to, and have one last hurrah before the end!
I'm currently downloading all of the DLC for my old xbox games, but kinda wish I had Halo 2 xbox right now. If I did, I could download the 2 maps that don't come with the PC version, and even get a free pass for the Halo Reach beta! That's right anyone playing Halo 2 till the end will get a something special on their spartan in Halo Reach to show for it, and free access to the Halo Reach beta! Goodbye and good luck Original Xbox Live, you will be missed! :'(
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4137306/tf2-sad-heavy2.jpg[/img] [url='https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4137306/Heavy_jeers05_OHHHHH%2C_IT_IS_SAD_DAY.wav']https://dl.dropbox.com/u/4137306/Heavy_jeers05_OHHHHH%2C_IT_IS_SAD_DAY.wav[/url]
(Yes I play Halo)

item.title: Original Xbox Live dies today
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

It’s a term PC fanboys use to make themselves feel superior to other people. Don’t even try to reason with fanboys. They’re too stuck up their ass to realize no one gives a shit about what they like/dislike.

item.title: Original Xbox Live dies today
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Shower:

I am pretty sure the xbox did not introduce Mass Effect or Splinter Cell

It did.

Splinter Cell was hyped as the XBox’s answer to Metal Gear Solid (it didn’t live up to this, but it was still freakin’ awesome), and Mass Effect was the XBox 360’s biggest title for 2007 (besides Halo 3, of course.) Sure, they were later ported to PC, but the XBox still introduced them (not that people should care unless the XBox version was better.)
Also, from my experience, the PC version of Mass Effect 1 sucked ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Original Xbox Live dies today
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Just because I don’t care about fanboy opinions does not mean I have to put up with them spamming this thread.

Many people have many great memories about the awesome time they had with playing original XBox games online, and now those people can never relive those experiences again. You don’t have to care, but that doesn’t mean you should troll this thread with your “o lol xbox iz gay lol!”

Read full topic

item.title: Original Xbox Live dies today
item.dc:creator: Torpede
item.description:
I cared for a second when, because I thought you meant the “Xbox Originals” games available for purchase on Xbox 360 live; I have some original Xbox games purchased and it would be a shame if they took them down. But then I looked at the title more closely and realized you were talking about the original xbox. And, yeah, after seeing that, I could honestly say, although I’m an Xbox 360 fan, I didn’t really care, man.

Read full topic
